query:
SELECT
                name,
                synonyms as "synonyms!: Vec<String>",
                id
            FROM title_group_tags
            WHERE
                name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
                OR EXISTS (
                    SELECT 1
                    FROM unnest(synonyms) AS synonym
                    WHERE synonym ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
                )
            ORDER BY name
            LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
